forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with a steady, soaking rain overnight. Increasing winds. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
